review: I don't use it as often as I thought I would but when I do need to show many people what is on my screen it is awesome.  Planning an outdoor wedding at the house was so easy using my 3D cad and pushing it to the big screen.
author: Robert Davis

review: I love this thing!! Keep in mind it will not play amazong prime

review: This is my second chrome cast. It's just as great as the first.

review: my son absolutely loves this! I love how easy it was so get working.
